Timer Pro is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage your time efficiently.

Whether you need to focus on work, track a workout session, or simply remind yourself to take a break, Timer Pro is here to assist.

Key Features:

Customizable Time Options: Select from a range of pre-set times or add your own custom durations.

Sound Notifications: Choose from multiple sound options to be alerted when your timer ends. You can even customize how many times the sound should loop.

Floating Timer Window: Keep the timer visible on your screen and move it anywhere you like, ensuring you never lose track of time.

User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, Timer Pro is easy to use, even for those who are not tech-savvy.

Timer Pro is the perfect tool for anyone looking to enhance their productivity with minimal effort.
